pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 12, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:30 p.m.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
